forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High near 20C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 68F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 60F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 50F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
